mapper.select: select a.user_id as user_id,a.name as user_name,a.company_name as user_company,a.user_real_name as realname,b.name as user_type from user a left join user_type b on a.user_type=b.id
mapper.insert: insert into public.cluemining_user (user_id, user_name, user_type, user_company, realname) VALUES (#{user_id},#{user_name},#{user_type},#{user_company},#{realname})
